idea: Welcome to LVL 1, the easiest one, you will have to found a lovely animal with 3 characters
Welcome to LVL 2, you will have to found a animal who is the king of the jungle with 4 characters
Welcome to LVL 3, you will have to found an insect who can carry 50 times his weight with 3 characters
Welcome to LVL 4, you will have to found an animal who his favourite food is bamboo
Welcome to LVL 5, you will have to found an animal who is the biggest in the ocean
Welcome to LVL 6, you will have to found a type of animal who can fly
